temples.name: Buenos Aires Argentina Temple
temples.adress: Aut. Tte. Gral. Riccheri N° 4955B1778DUA Ciudad Evita Buenos Aires, Argentina,
temples.ordinance: Ordinances for family names must be done in proper sequence—baptism, confirmation, Melchizedek Priesthood ordination (males), initiatory, endowment, and then sealing. Please allow sufficient time to perform all the ordinances you wish to complete during your visit. For additional help and information, please call the temple.
